entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Snow mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
